attributes.additional_details:
Fireworks have become increasingly louder and are being used more often. 

This is causing untold stress to animals and people suffering from PTSD

Silent fireworks are a great alternative it and should be encouraged.
attributes.background: To ban loud fireworks and encourage the introduction of silent fireworks.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Make fireworks quieter: Review and reduce the decibel limit on fireworks: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590838

Ban use and sale of non-silent fireworks: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599451
